text:
Всем привет! В команду развития бизнеса NVIDIA ищем 2х DL Solutions Architect.
Город: Москва, офис м.Савёловская/ Марьина Роща
Офис, полная занятость

NVIDIA’s Worldwide Field Operations (WWFO) team is looking for world class data scientists and engineers able to engage with developers, researchers, and start-ups, in multiple, impactful massive data analytics projects. We need individuals who can enable customer productivity and develop lasting relationships with our technology partners, making NVIDIA an integral part of end-user solutions. We are looking for someone always thinking about artificial intelligence, someone who can maintain synergy in a fast paced, rapidly evolving field, someone able to coordinate efforts between corporate marketing, industry business development and engineering.

You will be working with the latest AI architectures coupled with machine learning and Big Data analytics, enabling improved workflows and developing new, differentiated solutions.

*What you'll be doing:*

Assisting field business development in guiding the customer through the sales process for GPU Computing products, owning the technical relationship and assisting the customer in building innovative solutions based on NVIDIA technology.
Be an industry thought leader on integrating NVIDIA technology into AI architectures to support scientific and engineering applications.
Be an internal champion for Deep Learning and Data Science among the NVIDIA technical community.
Establish and maintain a community calendar of online/offline events and both monitor and report execution of such activities.

*What we need to see:*
5+ years of work related experience in software development or massive data analytics, CUDA experience highly desirable.
Experience working with modern Deep Learning software architecture and frameworks including cuDNN, Caffe, Torch, and Theano.
Solid background in the fields of NLP or/and CV
Ability to turn scientific paper into experiment and communicate of this with peers on a customer side
Good understanding and practical experience with hardware infrastructure for HPC and AI workloads
Customer facing skill-set and background working with developers, researchers, start-ups and established technical/industry partners.
Parallel programming expertise
Exposure to GPU technology and CUDA programming
Experience with OpenMP, MPI and other parallel programming languages
Demonstrable experience in strategy, research, communications.
Capable of working in a rapidly changing environment without losing focus.
Ability to multitask effectively in a fast paced environment.
Action-oriented with strong analytical and problem solving skills.
Strong time-management and organization skills for coordinating multiple initiatives, priorities and implementations of new technology and products into very complex projects.
BSc or similar in Engineering, Mathematics, Physics, or Computer Science.
Direct experience participating in communities (professionally or as highly engaged developer).
Strong written and oral communications skills with the ability to effectively interface with management and engineering.
Strong teamwork and interpersonal skills.

*Ways to stand out from the crowd:*
Direct experience in designing and growing developer or start-up communities.
Technical knowledge of developer digital platforms (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Google Hangouts, stackoverflow, etc.) and their trends.
CUDA optimization experience.
Masters or PhD in Engineering, Mathematics, Physics, or Computer Science related topics.

Резюме можно отправлять мне <mailto:azorina@nvidia.com|azorina@nvidia.com>, я перенаправлю в hr, вакансия также есть на хх. если есть вопросы - лет ми ноу:) вилку не знаю:(
